subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Josh Smith scored 22 points last night, the rookie Al Horford led a dominant performance on the boards and the Atlanta Hawks beat another 60-victory team from last season, holding off Steve Nash and the visiting Phoenix Suns, 105-96.
snippet: Josh Smith scored 22 points last night, the rookie Al Horford led a dominant performance on the boards and the Atlanta Hawks beat another 60-victory team from last season, holding off Steve Nash and the visiting Phoenix Suns, 105-96.
